versions.description: feat: restrict dev menu and page to authenticated users only- Move Dev navigation link inside user authentication check in main navbar- Add authentication protection to /dev page with redirect to login- Show loading state while checking authentication- Prevent unauthorized access to development tools and environment debug information- Follows same pattern as other protected routes (Chat, Protected, Debug)Security improvement to prevent non-authenticated users from accessing development center.ï¿½

fix: resolve bash syntax error in CI version increment scriptFix GitHub Actions passing commit messages with special characters.The commit message containing markdown links like [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)was causing bash syntax errors due to unescaped parentheses.Solution: Pass commit message through environment variable instead ofdirect command line argument to avoid shell interpretation issues.ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@a
